item.title: CREST Announces OVS Programme in Collaboration with OWASP

item.title: Our Online Threat Modelling Tool Hits 1000 Players
item.description: Since launching Copi last year, we’ve been thrilled that people have been increasingly using it among their teams to run online threat modelling games, and we’ve just hit 1,000 total players! Both Cornucopia and Elevation of Privilege versions are available with the latest decks for each. If you haven’t tried it yet, take a look⁠ – it could help you integrate threat modelling into your application development: https://copi.securedelivery.io/

item.title: We're Hiring! Come & Help Us Make Everything More Secure
item.description: We’re looking to fill a number of roles. If you’ve got good experience in security engineering, digital forensics & incident response, or leading secure product development functions and share our passion for securing software everywhere, please reach out for more information and an initial informal chat. You’ll be working alongside some of the best in the industry and helping teams at high-profile organisations to build their security capabilities to world-class levels.

item.title: Secure Delivery Announces New Partnership with Snyk
item.description: London — December 7, 2021. Secure Delivery today announced its channel partnership with Snyk, the leader in developer security. The new partnership will combine Snyk’s leading developer security tooling with Secure Delivery’s proven security coaching, consulting and managed services to accelerate the vigour of security capabilities in digital delivery organisations worldwide. People, process and technology are at the heart of any scalable security transformation and focussing on all three will elevate an organisation to world-class security capabilities.
